source/models/SignatureModel.js

SignatureModel

A Backbone.Model that represents a single signature pert_model = new SignatureModel()

Barista.Models.SignatureModel = Backbone.Model.extend({

initialize

Overides the base Model's initialize method to set the model's cid to the sig_id of the perturbagen

initialize: function(attributes, options) {

set the unique collection identifier to match the sig_id

this.cid = this.get('sig_id');

generate an html label for pert_type

var pert_type = this.get('pert_type'); switch(pert_type){ case "trt_cp": this.set({pert_type_label: '<span class="label" style="background-color: #E69F00">SMC</span>'}); break; case "trt_oe": this.set({pert_type_label: '<span class="label" style="background-color: #D55E00">OE</span>'}); break; case "trt_sh": this.set({pert_type_label: '<span class="label" style="background-color: #56B4E9">KD</span>'}); break; this.set({pert_type_label: '<span class="label" style="background-color: #BDBDBD">' + pert_type + '</span>'}); }

generate an html label for is_gold

var is_gold = this.get('is_gold'); if (is_gold){ this.set({is_gold_label: '<span class="label" style="background-color: #F0E442; color:gray">Gold</span>'}); }else{ this.set({is_gold_label: '<span class="label">Not Gold</span>'}); } } });
